gb.deck: A young graffiti artist named Beat and his gang of inline-skating Rudies roam the cel-shaded streets of Tokyo-to while spraying tags, defeating rival gangs and evading a city-wide police crackdown.
gb.platforms: Game Boy Advance, Dreamcast, Xbox 360 Games Store, PlayStation Network (PS3), PC, iPhone, Android, PlayStation Network (Vita)

description: A young graffiti artist named Beat and his gang of inline-skating Rudies roam the cel-shaded streets of Tokyo-to while spraying tags, defeating rival gangs and evading a city-wide police crackdown.
